channel.title: RSPS Problem
channel.description:
hello, Can Some1 help me to fix my rsps problem? i have download about 7 mods and no1 works :( can you tell me why? Please i really need help...
[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ydoD1mqYheA&feature=youtu.be[/youtube]

item.title: RSPS Problem
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Lil_Smok3r, post:14, topic:546136”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=665031.msg4445950#msg4445950 date=1408817945]
Dude, you added the commands client sided.
You need to add them server sided. There should be a file named “Commands” in the packets folder.
That’s where your commands go
[/quote]
Didn’t even realise he added it into client.java LOL
Wow…[/quote]
Everyone starts from somewhere…

Read full topic

Read full topic

item.title: RSPS Problem
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Just going to give you 2 commands, since it’ll take too long
And ::bank is pretty easy, google it. And for ::pvp just make a teleport (like Home)

Well for ::home,
here’s the command you need to add:

if (playerCommand.equals("home") && c.playerRights >= 0) { c.getPA().startTeleport(xxxx, xxxx, x, "modern"); }

The first two are the coordinates, the last one is the height, the modern bit is teleport animation (ancients, modern, etc, etc)

Now for ::food

if (playerCommand.equals("food") && c.playerRights >=0) {
c.getItems().addItem(FOOD ID, HOW MANY);
c.getItems().addItem(FOOD ID, HOW MANY);
c.getItems().addItem(FOOD ID, HOW MANY);
c.sendMessage("You have been supplied with food.");

So the addItem bit adds the item you want, and how many.
The sendMessage bit is obvious that it sends a message.

Reply/Message me if you need more help

Read full topic

item.title: RSPS Problem
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Okay. Since you’re trying every server/client in the book apparently…

First one you tried:
Get a new xstream .jar. Make sure the server starts fully before loading the client. The client must connect to the server to download the cache.

Second one:
Change the host client sided.

Third/Fourth one (Aggroth release):
Download this package
I fixed all the issues everyone was having running his source.
If you have the cache for it in your C:\ drive or anywhere else, remove it.

See what I changed: https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,664755.msg4445338.html#msg4445338

And I’m too lazy to watch the rest of it.

Read full topic
